title: satisfied in respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative Area
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative Area 

of Kildare County Council) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (administrative area kildare county council) order 2020

title: satisfied in respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 29 September 2020.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 29 September 2020.

title: satisfied in respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Kildare County
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Kildare County 
Council is prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period commencing on 
29 September 2020 and ending on 31 December 2021. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 September, 2020. 

DARRAGH O BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [380] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting administrative area kildare county council prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 29 september 2020 ending 31 december 2021 given official seal 28 september 2020 darragh brien minister housing planning local government notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd october 2020 380 3

title: satisfied in respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Administrative Area of Kildare 
County Council as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and Development 
(Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period commencing on 
29 September 2020 and ending on 31 December 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [380]
